parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: Identifier of the notification. If it is empty, this method generates an id. If it matches an existing notification, this method first clears that notification before proceeding with the create operation.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The notification id (either supplied or generated) that represents the created notification.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The id of the notification to be updated.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Contents of the notification to update to.

parameters.name: wasUpdated
parameters.description: Indicates whether a matching notification existed.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The id of the notification to be updated.

parameters.name: wasCleared
parameters.description: Indicates whether a matching notification existed.

parameters.name: notifications
parameters.description: The set of notifications currently in the system.

functions.name: getPermissionLevel
functions.description: Retrieves whether the user has enabled notifications from this app or extension.

events.name: onClosed
events.description: Fired when the notification closed, either by the system or by user action.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The notificationId of the closed notification.

parameters.name: byUser
parameters.description: True if the notification was closed by the user.

events.name: onClicked
events.description: Fired when the user clicked in a non-button area of the notification.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The notificationId of the clicked notification.

events.name: onButtonClicked
events.description: Fired when the  user pressed a button in the notification.

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: The notificationId of the clicked notification.

parameters.name: buttonIndex
parameters.description: The index of the button clicked by the user.

events.name: onPermissionLevelChanged
events.description: Fired when the user changes the permission level.

events.name: onShowSettings
events.description: Fired when the user clicked on a link for the app's notification settings.

title.description: Title of one item of a list notification.

type.description: Which type of notification to display.

iconUrl.description: A URL to the sender's avatar, app icon, or a thumbnail for image notifications.

appIconMaskUrl.description: A URL to the app icon mask.

title.description: Title of the notification (e.g. sender name for email).

contextMessage.description: Alternate notification content with a lower-weight font.

priority.description: Priority ranges from -2 to 2. -2 is lowest priority. 2 is highest. Zero is default.

eventTime.description: A timestamp associated with the notification, in milliseconds past the epoch.

buttons.description: Text and icons for up to two notification action buttons.

imageUrl.description: A URL to the image thumbnail for image-type notifications.

isClickable.description: Whether to show UI indicating that the app will visibly respond to clicks on the body of a notification.
